content.content:
`.products.brands`

Use **brands** subresource (of *products* resource) to
create, read and delete brands of a specific product by ID, to add brands to product from this subresource
you must specify only the ID of an existent brand, other brand properties will be syncronized from
*brands* resource

description.content: Brand page slug - Max length: **255** - RegEx pattern: **`^[a-z0-9]([a-z0-9-_./]+)?$`**
Image size (width x height) in px, such as 100x50 (100px width, 50px height) - Max length: **11** - RegEx pattern: **`^[1-9]([0-9]+)?x[1-9]([0-9]+)?$`**
Alternative text, HTML alt tag (important for SEO) - Max length: **255**

content.content:
*/products/[_id]/brands.json?limit&offset&sort&fields\&[field]* > Authentication
_GET_: **required** Use [default URL parameters](#introduction/overview/url-params) (metadata) for pagination and ordering, you can use any other parameter to query by particular object properties

*/products/[_id]/brands.json* > Authentication
_POST_: **required** Request body must be an object with valid brand `_id` and no more properties

*/products/[_id]/brands/[_id].json* > Authentication
_GET_, _DELETE_: **required** In read requests, response body will follow [this model](#reference/product-brands/product-brand-object)
